name: Samuel Umtiti
bio: Samuel Umtiti is a French professional footballer who plays as a center back for FC Barcelona and the France national team. Umtiti joined Barcelona from Lyon in 2016 and has since been an important figure in the team's defense, known for his strong tackling and aerial abilities.

additional_content.title: Samuel Umtiti: Overcoming injuries and regaining form
The importance of Umtiti in Barcelona's backline
